title: Find High-End Luxury at One of Thailand’s Top-Rated Resorts
description: Framed by pillowy sand, lush jungle and stunning beaches, Koh Lanta is home to the five-star Pimalai Resort & Spa-a sprawling, 120-acre island resort ideal of couples and families in search of barefoot luxury. Indulge in daily buffet breakfast, four-course set menu dining experiences, daily cocktail each, 60-minute massage each, return land and sea transfers from Krabi International Airport and much more. Plus, one child is included in the package with the option to upgrade to larger family options.
offer_address: 5 Krabi, Lang Sod pier - Koh Lanta, Tambon Ko Lanta Yai, Amphoe Ko Lanta, Chang Wat Krabi 81150, Thailand

title: Secluded Koh Lanta Beachfront Escape with Sunset Sea Views
description: Escape to a hilltop hideaway for a sun and sea getaway overlooking Koh Kwang Beach at Avani+ Koh Lanta Krabi Resort. Bask on sun-soaked beaches, dive into crystal clear waters and observe sublime sunsets with a cool cocktail in hand from the Reggae Bar. Indulge in a treatment at AvaniSpa, snorkel over vibrant coral reefs or explore mangrove forests and sea caves. Once the day is done, retire to the comfort of a lavish suite or villa and be lulled to sleep by the crashing of the waves.
offer_address: 315 Moo 1, Saladan, Koh Lanta, Krabi 81150, Thailand

title: Koh Lanta Five-Star Beachfront Suites off the Coast of Thailand near Krabi
description:
Experience a five-star luxury escape at Pimalai Resort and Spa, perfectly set on Koh Lanta island, located off the coast of Krabi. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2022 award - ranked within the top 1% of hotels and resorts in the world, based on traveller feedback - this secluded retreat has been expertly crafted for romantics, groups and families seeking an intimate hideaway. Set away from the crowds, you'll find serenity at this award-winning resort nestled between the lush undulating hills and sugar-fine shores.

Live like royalty in palatial luxury, with each suite and villa boasting stylish furnishings and ample space. Find the epitome of relaxation at Pimalai Spa or spend your day lazing by the pool, or adventure away from the resort and discover the kaleidoscopic underwater coral reefs right on your doorstep.
offer_address: 99 Moo 5, Ba Kan Tiang Beach Koh Lanta, Krabi 81150, Thailand.
